content: --गतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} --गमनं --पातः {1} a downward fall or motion, descent; going downwards. {2} degradation, downfall. going to perdition or hell; मूलानामधोगतिः <ls>K. 41</ls> (where °ति has both senses); °तिं आयाति <ls>Pt. 1. 150</ls> sinks, comes down (feels dishonoured); <ls>Ms. 3. 17</ls>; अरक्षितारमत्तारं नृपं विद्यादधोगतिं <ls n="Ms.">8. 309</ls> destined to go to hell.
